findings.rationale: The term of confidentiality lasting indefinitely can pose a risk, as it may prevent the parties from using information in the future, potentially impacting their business operations.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The clause requiring indemnification without limits can expose a party to significant financial risk, especially if a breach leads to severe claims or damages.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: Excluding limitations on liability can lead to potentially unlimited financial exposure for either party in case of a breach or other claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The unilateral assignment of all intellectual property rights to Company A may deter collaboration and innovation from Company B, impacting future business relationships.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: This clause could discourage a party from bringing legitimate disputes to court if they fear incurring high legal costs, thus impacting their ability to protect their rights.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
